When a fair six-sided dice is tossed on a table top, the bottom face cannot be seen. What is the probability that the product of the $5$ faces than can be seen is divisible by $6$?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 1/3 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 1/2 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 2/3 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 5/6 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 1$
